you_found_everything: Well done, you found all the words!
timer_set: The timer has been set to {{value}} seconds.
enter_valid_number: Please enter a valid number greater than 5.
timer_too_high: Please enter a value less than 600 seconds.
invalid_word_returned: The URL does not appear to return a valid word.
invalid_url: The URL you provided is not valid.
no_selection_message: Please select letters in the second word.
cannot_move_all_letters_message: You cannot move the entire word.
original_word_message: You cannot validate the original words from the game.
word_check_error_message: An error occurred while checking the word.
tutorial_step1_desc: Touch the letters of the first word to select them. The letters must be consecutive.
tutorial_step2_desc: Click on a space between the letters of the second word to insert your selection.
tutorial_step3_desc: Select consecutive letters in the second word and validate the formed word to score points!
tutorial_step4_desc: You have a limited time to find the maximum number of words and eliminate all letters from the second word. Good luck!
all_levels_complete: Amazing! You have completed all levels! You can now play bonus mode with random words. Stay tuned for new levels in upcoming updates!
